entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-08-08
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Unexpected behavior in HttpLoggingMiddleware #57242
  • GroupName is applied to all endpoints when it shouldn't be. #57241
  • Perf regression: multiple_queries #57240
  • Perf improvement: fortunes #57239
  • Placing Interactive Content Inside SectionContent component disables its interactive event handlers #57238
  • Sites using ShadowCopy fail with 500 errors when Maximum Worker Processes > 1 #57235
  • Collections of non-nullable types are not checked for null in ASP.NET Core APIs #57234
  • CancellationTokenSource potential leaks in SignalR HubConnection #57232
  • [9.0.100-rc.1.24406.1] EasyCMS app launch failed with 'Multiple constructors accepting all given argument types have been found in type 'Microsoft.AspNetCore.CookiePolicy.CookiePolicyMiddleware' exception #57231
  • Perf regression: ApiCrudUpdateProduct #57229
  • Perf improvement: fortunes #57227
  • Perf improvement: fortunes_dapper, json_middleware, plaintext #57226
  • Ability to know why the antiforgery token validation has failed and then return custom responses #57225
    Backlog

Closed

  • Trailing comma in launchSettings.json breaks `dotnet watch` #57214
  • [9.0-preview7] OpenAPI schemas are not stable between generations #56990
    9.0-rc1
  • Perf regression: fortunes #57228
  • [WebToolsE2E] Run .exe/.dll file with error "An exception occurred while trying to decrypt the element." from publish folder after publishing .NET 9.0 Razor/MVC/Blazor web app project. #57137
  • [Blazor] JS initializers declared in RCLs run twice #57087
    9.0-rc1
  • Blazor enhanced navigation "before" javascript event #53887
    9.0-rc1
  • Consuming scoped service from App.razor #57233
  • FocusOnNavigate does not work (dotnet8 - BlazorWebApp) #52412
    .NET 10 Planning
  • runtime and efcore dependency out of date #57179
  • Perf improvement: json #57205

PullRequests

Created

  • [Blazor] Fix antiforgery not being available after first render #57237
    area-blazor
  • Use System.Threading.Lock in Kestrel #57236
    community-contribution, area-networking
  • Middleware/Rewrite: Update XML comments for "AddRedirect" to indicate status code. #57224
    community-contribution, area-networking, area-middleware

Merged

  • Update azure-pipelines-mirror-within-azdo.yml for 8.0 #56457
    area-infrastructure, pending-ci-rerun, 8.0.9
  • [CG[ Update ws dep in release/8.0 #56677
    area-infrastructure, area-signalr, tell-mode, pending-ci-rerun, 8.0.9
  • [CG] Update ws dep in release/6.0 #56676
    area-infrastructure, pending-ci-rerun, 6.0.34
  • [release/8.0] (deps): Bump src/submodules/googletest from `a7f443b` to `3e3b44c` #57123
    area-infrastructure, pending-ci-rerun, 8.0.9
  • [release/8.0] Skip timing out MVC template tests in 8.0 #56978
    area-mvc, tell-mode, pending-ci-rerun, 8.0.9
  • [release/6.0] (deps): Bump src/submodules/googletest from `a7f443b` to `3e3b44c` #57122
    area-infrastructure, pending-ci-rerun, 6.0.34
  • Implement deep copy for OpenApiSchema instances #57223
    area-mvc, feature-openapi, area-minimal, 9.0-rc1
  • [release/8.0] Update Swashbuckle.AspNetCore to 6.6.2 #56266
    Servicing-approved, area-infrastructure, community-contribution, 8.0.9
  • [release/8.0] Update Microsoft.IO.Redist dependency #57006
    area-infrastructure, tell-mode, pending-ci-rerun, 8.0.9
  • [release/6.0] Update `spa-templates` submodule #57029
    area-infrastructure, tell-mode, pending-ci-rerun, 6.0.34
  • [release/6.0] Fix AzDO area path for policy violations reporting #57105
    area-infrastructure, tell-mode, pending-ci-rerun, 6.0.34
  • [8.0] Add support for trusting dev certs on linux #57108
    Servicing-approved, area-networking, 8.0.9
  • Revert "Prefer keys old enough to have propagated (#54309)" #57186
    area-dataprotection, 9.0-rc1
  • Update IdentityModel to 8.0.1 #57215
    area-infrastructure, 9.0-rc1
  • [Blazor] Allow `<FocusOnNavigate>` to work when rendered statically #57131
    area-blazor, 9.0-rc1

Updated

  • Use [DebuggerDisableUserUnhandledExceptions] #57148
    area-blazor
  • Add hpack decoding test #57221
    area-networking
  • Update azure-pipelines-mirror-within-azdo.yml for 8.0 #56456
    area-infrastructure, pending-ci-rerun
  • [6.0] Optionally respect HTTP/1.0 keep-Alive for HTTP.sys #57203
    Servicing-consider, area-networking, 6.0.x
  • [8.0] Optionally respect HTTP/1.0 keep-Alive for HTTP.sys #57182
    Servicing-consider, area-networking, 8.0.x
  • [release/8.0] [Infrastructure] Update jquery validate periodically #56880
    area-mvc, pending-ci-rerun, 8.0.x
  • [release/6.0] [Infrastructure] Update jquery validate periodically #56881
    area-mvc, pending-ci-rerun, 6.0.x
  • Improve performance of UriHelper.GetDisplayUrl #55611
    Perf, community-contribution, pending-ci-rerun, area-networking
  • Upgrade yarn dependencies #57092
    area-infrastructure, tell-mode, pending-ci-rerun, 8.0.x
  • [OutputCaching] OutputCacheOptions.ApplicationServices is always null during initialization #55847
    community-contribution, pending-ci-rerun, area-networking, area-middleware
